app_detail:
VR Painter can draw pictures with various themes from a background!
Draw your imaginary image in the newly opened space.

VR Painter has various themes.

▶Theme
- Grassland
- Sea
- Snow
- Space
- Sky

▶Remote control explain
Top: Select 
Bottom: Drawing
----
